channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Easy Contact Form Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Easy Contact Form Pro

item.title: CVE-2021-24168|2024-08-03T19:21:18.620Z -- unknown -- easy%20contact%20form%20pro
item.description: The Easy Contact Form Pro WordPress plugin before 1.1.1.9 did not properly sanitise the text fields (such as Email Subject, Email Recipient, etc) when creating or editing a form, leading to an authenticated (author+) stored cross-site scripting issue. This could allow medium privilege accounts (such as author and editor) to perform XSS attacks against high privilege ones like administrator.
